txt.en: 'I would like to hear more from Dómárr about what he has encountered in Zelem-melek. Perhaps an accurate account will bring Mögr to his senses.\n\n'I would like to return with useful information, at any rate.'
'I hope Mögr has the sense to listen to Reinn this time, eh? In the meantime, I have been thinking about what to do about the Durub Orcs in Gazatu-ru....'
'Let us listen to Dómárr's tale, [placeholder]. Perhaps he will have information I can bring back to the Twenty-first Hall.'
Dómárr has found many unpleasantries during his travels through Zelem-melek.
Reinn can be found in the Great Hall of Durin.\n\nYou should speak with Reinn.
Dómárr can be found in the Great Hall of Durin.\n\nYou should speak with Dómárr.
